description: Request of an EIA Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) for Outline planning application (with all matters reserved except for access) for a phased development providing up to 2000 new homes (Use Classes C2 and C3), non-residential uses (Use Classes E, F and Sui Generis), open spaces and other ancillary infrastructure.
